channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Luminous gets funding to bring LUMI solar construction robot to Australia
item.description: Luminous Robotics is expanding deployments of its LUMI robot for safe, efficient PV installation from the U.S. to Australia. The post Luminous gets fu...

item.title: Trump’s tariffs are unfair to most Americans. Here’s how they could actually be beneficial.
item.description: Instead of blanket tariffs, an ethical policy shows a clear and justifiable need for protection.

item.title: How generative AI could help make construction sites safer

item.title: What’s in your 401(k)? Why you need to know — especially boomers and Generation X
item.description: Your target-date fund might have the wrong mix for you, and new alternatives could be risky.

item.title: Is the stock market open on the Fourth of July — and what time does it close on July 3? What about FedEx, UPS and mail delivery?
item.description: Independence Day comes with many closures — although it may be a good time to hit the stores.

item.title: Bright Data beat Elon Musk and Meta in court — now its $100M AI platform is taking on Big Tech

item.title: From 30 days to 1: Chevron’s cloud migration ROI in real numbers
item.description: Chevron's agentic architectures must be able to process petabytes of data in the cloud and at the edge to support its critical operations.

item.title: Capital One builds agentic AI modeled after its own org chart to supercharge auto sales
item.description: Capital One's head of AI foundations explained at VB Transform on how the bank patterned its AI agents after itself.

item.title: ‘My whole financial world is upside down’: I’m ‘medically retired’ at 51 with $428K in stocks. Is this enough to live on?
item.description: “We don’t know where we will retire. It could be South Carolina, Georgia, Alabama, Mississippi or Texas.”

item.title: Transform 2025: Why observability is critical for AI agent ecosystems
item.description: New Relic's Ashan Willy talked about how they're instrumenting agentic systems for measurable ROI to maximize agentic AI.

item.title: My mother, 89, keeps getting her credit card scammed. She gets a new one — and it happens again. What’s going on?
item.description: “It hasn’t stopped.”

item.title: Enterprise giants Atlassian, Intuit, and AWS are planning for a world where agents call the APIs
item.description: In the Women in AI breakfast, technologists from Atlassian, Intuit and AWS offered advice based on first-hand experience with AI agents.
